name: PingOne Session Main Flow
description: Imported on Wed Mar 06 2024 16:16:44 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

annotation.value: No Active Session, Go to Sign In
Create session and pass control back to PingOne for token issuance
Session Exists, Go to Sign On Success

value.label: PingOne Sign On with Registration, Password Reset and Recovery

nodeDescription.value: Returns successful flow completion back to the PingOne application connection
Checks if the user has logged in with a password in the last 8 hours

annotation.value: PingOne - Sign On and Password Reset
Sign On Flow returns userId via JSON Success

application.description: An object that specifies the configuration information about the PingOne application that initiated the authentication request.
application.name: application

authorizationRequest.description: An object that specifies all the parameters from the OIDC authorization request.
authorizationRequest.name: authorizationRequest

loginHint.description: A string that specifies an identifier to pre-fill the username field of a sign-on screen.
loginHint.name: loginHint

maxSecondsSinceLastSignOn.description: An integer that specifies the maximum amount of time allowed (in seconds) since the user last authenticated. If the user's last sign on in the session is greater than the integer value specified in this property, then existing session information cannot be used to skip authentication or influence any authentication logic. This value is set automatically to 0 if prompt=login is set for an OIDC application or if ForceAuthn=true is set for a SAML application. Otherwise, this value is set to the max_age property value for OIDC applications, if present, or omitted otherwise.
maxSecondsSinceLastSignOn.name: maxSecondsSinceLastSignOn

relayState.description: Internal information that is only useful to P1. This is meant to be opaque and may be changed or removed in the future.
relayState.name: relayState

samlRequest.description: An object that specifies all the parameters from the SAML request.
samlRequest.name: samlRequest

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';
